trans-unit.source: Provides information about a serializable object.
The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData> structure contains data that can be used to deserialize a serializable object.

To get a <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData>, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.ISerializableObjectContract.GetSerializableObjectData%2A> method of an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.ISerializableObjectContract>.
The only <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData> field that contains a value for every serializable object is the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.ObjectId> field.
Represents an array that contains the length of each of the dimensions of the serializable array that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData"></xref> describes.
<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.DimensionLengths> is `null` if <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.IsArray> is `false`.
Represents an array that contains the lower bound of each of the dimensions of the serializable array that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData"></xref> describes.
<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.DimensionLowerBounds> is `null` if <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.IsArray> is `false`.
Represents an array that contains the indexes of the parent array that contains the serializable object that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData"></xref> describes.
<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.ElementIndexes> is `null` if <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.IsArrayElement> is `false`.
Indicates whether the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData"></xref> describes a serializable array.

<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.IsArray> is `true` if the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData> describes an array; otherwise, <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.IsArray> is `false`.

If <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.IsArray> and <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.IsArrayElement> are both `true`, the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData> describes a jagged array.
Indicates whether the <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData"></xref> describes an element in a serializable array.

<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.IsArrayElement> is `true` if the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData> describes an element in an array; otherwise, <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.IsArrayElement> is `false`.

If <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.IsArrayElement> is `true`, then <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.ParentId> identifies the array, and <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.MemberName> is `null`.

If <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.IsArray> and <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.IsArrayElement> are both `true`, the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData> describes a jagged array.
Represents the member name of the serializable object that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData"></xref> describes.

<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.MemberName> is `null` if the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData> describes an object that is not a member of another object (that is, <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.ParentId> is `null`).
Represents the ID of the serializable object that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData"></xref> describes.
To create an object ID, implementations of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.ISerializableObjectContract> can use the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator?displayProperty=fullName> class.
Represents the ID of the parent of the serializable object that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData"></xref> describes.

<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData.ParentId> is `null` if the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.SerializableObjectData> describes a serializable object that is not a member of another object.
